bug.author: mouradmourafiq
bug.summary: Restart/Resume forms do not handle api errors
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
When restarting/copying/resuming runs from the UI, if you pass a wrong config, the form will just disappear without any visual feedback. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
The behavior should be the same as other forms implemented in modals, they should block until success state is emitted, otherwise they need to print the errors in the form. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
v1.0.84
